001/*

005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.qname.IEnhancedQName;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
010
011import java.util.Collection;
012import java.util.List;
013import java.util.function.Predicate;
014import java.util.stream.Collectors;
015import java.util.stream.Stream;
016
017import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
019
020/**
021 * The API for accessing information about a given Metaschema module.
022 * <p>
023 * A Metaschem module may import another Metaschema module. This import graph
024 * can be accessed using {@link #getImportedModules()}.
025 * <p>
026 * Global scoped Metaschema definitions can be accessed using
027 * {@link #getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(Integer)},
028 * {@link #getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(Integer)}, and
029 * {@link #getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(IEnhancedQName)}. These methods take
030 * into consideration the import order to provide the global definitions that
031 * are in scope within the given Metschema module.
032 * <p>
033 * Global scoped definitions exported by this Metaschema module, available for
034 * use by importing Metaschema modules, can be accessed using
035 * {@link #getExportedAssemblyDefinitions()},
036 * {@link #getExportedFieldDefinitions()}, and
037 * {@link #getExportedFlagDefinitions()}.
038 * <p>
039 * Global scoped definitions defined directly within the given Metaschema module
040 * can be accessed using {@link #getAssemblyDefinitions()},
041 * {@link #getFieldDefinitions()}, and {@link #getFlagDefinitions()}, along with
042 * similarly named access methods.
043 *
044 * @param <M>
045 *          the imported module Java type
046 * @param <D>
047 *          the model definition Java type
048 * @param <FL>
049 *          the flag definition Java type
050 * @param <FI>
051 *          the field definition Java type
052 * @param <A>
053 *          the assembly definition Java type
054 */
055public interface IModuleExtended<
056    M extends IModuleExtended<M, D, FL, FI, A>,
057    D extends IModelDefinition,
058    FL extends IFlagDefinition,
059    FI extends IFieldDefinition,
060    A extends IAssemblyDefinition> extends IModule {
061
062  /**
063   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are not locally defined.
064   *
065   * @param <DEF>
066   *          the type of definition
067   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
068   */
069  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allNonLocalDefinitions() {
070    return definition -> IDefinition.ModuleScope.PUBLIC.equals(definition.getModuleScope())
071        || ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType())
072            && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Get a filter that will match all definitions that are root assemblies.
077   *
078   * @param <DEF>
079   *          the type of definition
080   * @return a predicate implementing the filter
081   */
082  static <DEF extends IDefinition> Predicate<DEF> allRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
083    return definition -> ModelType.ASSEMBLY.equals(definition.getModelType())
084        && ((IAssemblyDefinition) definition).isRoot();
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  @NonNull
089  List<? extends M> getImportedModules();
090
091  @Override
092  @Nullable
093  M getImportedModuleByShortName(String name);
094
095  @Override
096  @NonNull
097  Collection<FL> getFlagDefinitions();
098
099  @Override
100  @Nullable
101  FL getFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name);
102
103  @Override
104  @NonNull
105  Collection<A> getAssemblyDefinitions();
106
107  @Override
108  @Nullable
109  A getAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull Integer name);
110
111  @Override
112  @NonNull
113  Collection<FI> getFieldDefinitions();
114
115  @Override
116  @Nullable
117  FI getFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull Integer name);
118
119  @Override
120  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
121  @NonNull
122  default List<D> getAssemblyAndFieldDefinitions() {
123    return ObjectUtils.notNull(
124        Stream.concat(
125            (Stream<D>) getAssemblyDefinitions().stream(),
126            (Stream<D>) getFieldDefinitions().stream())
127            .collect(Collectors.toList()));
128  }
129
130  @Override
131  @Nullable
132  default A getScopedAssemblyDefinitionByName(@NonNull Integer name) {
133    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
134    A retval = getAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
135    if (retval == null) {
136      // try global definitions from imported Metaschema modules
137      retval = getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(name);
138    }
139    return retval;
140  }
141
142  @Override
143  @Nullable
144  default FI getScopedFieldDefinitionByName(@NonNull Integer name) {
145    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
146    FI retval = getFieldDefinitionByName(name);
147    if (retval == null) {
148      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
149      retval = getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(name);
150    }
151    return retval;
152  }
153
154  @Override
155  @Nullable
156  default FL getScopedFlagDefinitionByName(@NonNull IEnhancedQName name) {
157    // first try local/global top-level definitions from current metaschema module
158    FL retval = getFlagDefinitionByName(name);
159    if (retval == null) {
160      // try global definitions from imported metaschema modules
161      retval = getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(name);
162    }
163    return retval;
164  }
165
166  @Override
167  @NonNull
168  default Collection<? extends A> getExportedRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
169    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getExportedAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
170        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
171        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
172  }
173
174  @Override
175  @NonNull
176  default Collection<? extends A> getRootAssemblyDefinitions() {
177    return ObjectUtils.notNull(getAssemblyDefinitions().stream()
178        .filter(allRootAssemblyDefinitions())
179        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
180  }
181
182  @Override
183  @NonNull
184  Collection<? extends FL> getExportedFlagDefinitions();
185
186  @Override
187  @Nullable
188  FL getExportedFlagDefinitionByName(IEnhancedQName name);
189
190  @Override
191  @NonNull
192  Collection<? extends FI> getExportedFieldDefinitions();
193
194  @Override
195  @Nullable
196  FI getExportedFieldDefinitionByName(Integer name);
197
198  @Override
199  @NonNull
200  Collection<? extends A> getExportedAssemblyDefinitions();
201
202  @Override
203  @Nullable
204  A getExportedAssemblyDefinitionByName(Integer name);
205}
